CHOCOLATE PROTEIN BALLS

Rich chocolate protein balls that taste like brownie batter. 20g protein with deep chocolate flavor.

20g
Protein
170
Calories
15m
Total Time
20
Yield

Nutrition per 2 balls

Carbs15g
Fat8g
Fiber3g
Sugar6g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 150g rolled oats
  • 60g chocolate whey protein powder
  • 45g unsweetened cocoa powder
  • 128g almond butter
  • 80g maple syrup
  • 60g dark chocolate chips

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Mix Dry

Combine oats, protein powder, and cocoa powder.

2

Add Wet

Stir in almond butter and maple syrup.

3

Add Chips

Fold in chocolate chips.

4

Shape

Roll into 20 balls.

5

Chill

Refrigerate until firm, about 30 minutes.

PRO TIPS

ðŸ’¡

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

ðŸ’¡

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

ðŸ’¡

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
